stories.title: A piece of space junk the size of a school bus will impact the moon

stories.text: Hi, I'm a PM at a series B startup. I've been put in charge of redesigning the web page, which currently sucks. Ideally, I can outsource most of this to a good web dev agency. We are in the MLOps space, and so some domain knowledge from the agency would be great (or the ablity to learn about the space and incorporate it into the design). Does anyone have any good recs for an agency like this?
stories.title: Startup Website Design Agency Recs

stories.text:
Some time ago (1 or 2 weeks maybe) I stumbled upon a link (posted on HN) to a blog post where the author explained his process for todo lists and that it consisted in a txt file that was maintained for years. He explained that he edited the lines of the todo list with simple notes on how it went (interview with a new hire for ex) and that it served as a way to know what was done every day for the past years.

I really want to find it, looked through my history and upvoted but no result. Thanks a lot
stories.title: Help me find that recently posted link about a todo list
